## Installation

gamutils can be installed from GitHub:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("agruss2/gamutils", dependencies = TRUE)
```

You can also install the development version of gamutils from [GitHub](https://github.com/), if your prefer, with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("agruss2/gamutils")
```
